name: MY MOBILE WITNESS INC.
sampleDescriptions: Discussions Regarding DHS Budget Increases to Fusion Centers
Develop funding for pilot and expansion of an on-line nationwide tip sharing platform
Working with DHS to develop a nation-wide pilot program for technology that interfaces with fusion centers across the country.
Develop a DHS pilot program that allows citizens to send pictures and message tips to most proximate Fusion Centers, nationwide.
Increase funding for Fusion Centers to allow them to leverage citizen based mobile reporting technology
